properties.name: Tatev Monastery
properties.description: 9th-century monastery on cliff edge, reached by world's longest reversible cable car

properties.name: Geghard Monastery
properties.description: UNESCO medieval monastery partially carved into mountain rock with exceptional acoustics

properties.name: Lake Sevan
properties.description: One of world's largest high-altitude freshwater lakes at 1,900m with island monastery

properties.name: Noravank Monastery
properties.description: 13th-century monastery in dramatic red rock gorge with intricate stone carvings

properties.name: Garni Temple
properties.description: Only standing Greco-Roman colonnaded temple in the former Soviet region
